ygData.subject: Kilij
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Loremasters, We have been hunting the SG for the plans for the Kilij. It seems the kill junk for Giant spawn works in South Ro just like Rathe.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Loremasters,

We have been hunting the SG for the plans for the Kilij. It seems the kill
junk for Giant spawn works in South Ro just like Rathe. When no giants are
spawned, we kill all the mummies, madmen, and pumas and Giants seem to start
poping. Heh, not many folks in the desert of S Ro so last night we had a
train contest for low level junk! Since warriors can use this weapon, lots
of my guildmates are helping so I have group to hunt there. The SG with the
plans is fairly low, but we kill any SG that pops for exp. This weapons
stats show it is heavier than a barbed whip, so I don't know that I will
switch to it permanently from banded Thulians. Barbed whips weren't lore, I
used to dual wield 2 of them.
BTW, being a wood elf woman and a RL woman, I think the male art needs some
improvements! If I have to run around in a skimpy suit dead, why do all my
male friends have almost full cothing! I even accused one of our paladins of
getting me killed alot so he could see my undies, hehe. Thank God for Barbs
and those wonderful kilts! I have only been harassed for being female twice
seriously and my guildmates all proceeded to gang up and intimidate the
person sufficiently to end it.

Leveling by accident, playing for fun!

Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe (L34)
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur, Xegony
